001package io.jstach.rainbowgum.format;
002
003import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogEvent;
004import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogFormatter;
005
006/**
007 * An abstract formatter where the actual full layout of the event is not a concern of the
008 * user and by default usually has the semi-standard layout of <strong>TTLL - Time,
009 * Thread, Level, Logger</strong>. It allows changing the format of time, thread, level,
010 * logger, etc. Typically the formatters get called in the following order.
011 * <ol>
012 * <li>Timestamp</li>
013 * <li>Thread</li>
014 * <li>Level</li>
015 * <li>Logger Name</li>
016 * <li>Key Values if enabled</li>
017 * <li>Formatted Message</li>
018 * <li>Throwable if not null</li>
019 * </ol>
020 * If plugins would like to provide some sort of standard formatter they should extend
021 * this class as well as the {@link AbstractBuilder}.
022 *
023 * @see AbstractBuilder
024 */
025public class AbstractStandardEventFormatter implements LogFormatter.EventFormatter {
026
027        /**
028         * immutable field
029         */
030        protected final LogFormatter timestampFormatter;
031
032        /**
033         * immutable field
034         */
035        protected final LogFormatter threadFormatter;
036
037        /**
038         * immutable field
039         */
040        protected final LogFormatter levelFormatter;
041
042        /**
043         * immutable field
044         */
045        protected final LogFormatter nameFormatter;
046
047        /**
048         * immutable field
049         */
050        protected final LogFormatter messageFormatter;
051
052        /**
053         * immutable field
054         */
055        protected final LogFormatter keyValuesFormatter;
056
057        /**
058         * immutable field
059         */
060        protected final LogFormatter throwableFormatter;
061
062        /**
063         * Combined formatter.
064         */
065        protected final LogFormatter eventFormatter;
066
067        /**
068         * Override
069         * @param timestampFormatter not <code>null</code>.
070         * @param threadFormatter not <code>null</code>.
071         * @param levelFormatter not <code>null</code>.
072         * @param nameFormatter not <code>null</code>.
073         * @param messageFormatter not <code>null</code>.
074         * @param throwableFormatter not <code>null</code>.
075         * @param keyValuesFormatter not <code>null</code>.
076         */
077        protected AbstractStandardEventFormatter( //
078                        LogFormatter timestampFormatter, //
079                        LogFormatter threadFormatter, //
080                        LogFormatter levelFormatter, //
081                        LogFormatter nameFormatter, //
082                        LogFormatter messageFormatter, //
083                        LogFormatter throwableFormatter, //
084                        LogFormatter keyValuesFormatter) {
085                super();
086                this.levelFormatter = levelFormatter;
087                this.timestampFormatter = timestampFormatter;
088                this.nameFormatter = nameFormatter;
089                this.messageFormatter = messageFormatter;
090                this.throwableFormatter = throwableFormatter;
091                this.keyValuesFormatter = keyValuesFormatter;
092                this.threadFormatter = threadFormatter;
093
094                this.eventFormatter = build( //
095                                timestampFormatter, //
096                                threadFormatter, //
097                                levelFormatter, //
098                                nameFormatter, //
099                                messageFormatter, //
100                                throwableFormatter, //
101                                keyValuesFormatter);
102
103        }
104
105        /**
106         * Creates the standard default TTLL layout.
107         * @param timestampFormatter not <code>null</code>.
108         * @param threadFormatter not <code>null</code>.
109         * @param levelFormatter not <code>null</code>.
110         * @param nameFormatter not <code>null</code>.
111         * @param messageFormatter not <code>null</code>.
112         * @param throwableFormatter not <code>null</code>.
113         * @param keyValuesFormatter not <code>null</code>.
114         * @return formatter.
115         */
116        public static LogFormatter build(LogFormatter timestampFormatter, //
117                        LogFormatter threadFormatter, //
118                        LogFormatter levelFormatter, //
119                        LogFormatter nameFormatter, //
120                        LogFormatter messageFormatter, //
121                        LogFormatter throwableFormatter, //
122                        LogFormatter keyValuesFormatter) {
123                var b = LogFormatter.builder();
124                if (!timestampFormatter.isNoop()) {
125                        b.add(timestampFormatter);
126                        b.text(" ");
127                }
128                if (!threadFormatter.isNoop()) {
129                        b.text("[");
130                        b.add(threadFormatter);
131                        b.text("] ");
132                }
133                if (!levelFormatter.isNoop()) {
134                        b.add(levelFormatter);
135                        b.text(" ");
136                }
137                b.add(nameFormatter);
138                if (!keyValuesFormatter.isNoop()) {
139                        b.text(" {");
140                        b.add(keyValuesFormatter);
141                        b.text("}");
142                }
143                if (!messageFormatter.isNoop()) {
144                        b.text(" - ");
145                        b.add(messageFormatter);
146                }
147                b.newline();
148                if (!throwableFormatter.isNoop()) {
149                        b.add(throwableFormatter);
150                }
151                return b.build();
152        }
153
154        /**
155         * Abstract TTLL Builder.
156         *
157         * @param <T> builder type.
158         */
159        public static abstract class AbstractBuilder<T> {
160
161                /**
162                 * mutable field
163                 */
164                protected LogFormatter levelFormatter = LevelFormatter.of();
165
166                /**
167                 * mutable field
168                 */
169                protected LogFormatter timestampFormatter = TimestampFormatter.of();
170
171                /**
172                 * mutable field
173                 */
174                protected LogFormatter nameFormatter = LogFormatter.builder().loggerName().build();
175
176                /**
177                 * mutable field
178                 */
179                protected LogFormatter messageFormatter = LogFormatter.builder().message().build();
180
181                /**
182                 * mutable field
183                 */
184                protected LogFormatter throwableFormatter = ThrowableFormatter.of();
185
186                /**
187                 * mutable field
188                 */
189                protected LogFormatter keyValuesFormatter = LogFormatter.noop();
190
191                /**
192                 * mutable field
193                 */
194                protected LogFormatter threadFormatter = LogFormatter.builder().threadName().build();
195
196                /**
197                 * For builder
198                 * @return this.
199                 */
200                protected abstract T self();
201
202                /**
203                 * Do nothing constructor
204                 */
205                protected AbstractBuilder() {
206                }
207
208                /**
209                 * Sets timestamp formatter. If not set
210                 * {@link io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogFormatter.TimestampFormatter#of()} will be used.
211                 * @param timestampFormatter formatter to use for rendering
212                 * {@link LogEvent#timestamp()}.
213                 * @return this builder.
214                 */
215                public T timestampFormatter(LogFormatter timestampFormatter) {
216                        this.timestampFormatter = timestampFormatter;
217                        return self();
218
219                }
220
221                /**
222                 * Sets thread formatter. If not set thread name will be used.
223                 * @param threadFormatter formatter to use for rendering thread information.
224                 * @return this builder.
225                 */
226                public T threadFormatter(LogFormatter threadFormatter) {
227                        this.threadFormatter = threadFormatter;
228                        return self();
229                }
230
231                /**
232                 * Sets the level formatter. If not set
233                 * {@link io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogFormatter.LevelFormatter#of()} will be used.
234                 * @param levelFormatter formatter to use for rendering level information.
235                 * @return this builder.
236                 */
237                public T levelFormatter(LogFormatter levelFormatter) {
238                        this.levelFormatter = levelFormatter;
239                        return self();
240                }
241
242                /**
243                 * Sets the logger name formatter. If not set the default will be used.
244                 * @param nameFormatter formatter to use for rendering logger name.
245                 * @return this builder.
246                 */
247                public T nameFormatter(LogFormatter nameFormatter) {
248                        this.nameFormatter = nameFormatter;
249                        return self();
250
251                }
252
253                /**
254                 * Sets the throwable formatter. If not set
255                 * {@link io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogFormatter.ThrowableFormatter#of()} will be used.
256                 * @param throwableFormatter formatter to use for rendering throwables.
257                 * @return this builder.
258                 */
259                public T throwableFormatter(LogFormatter throwableFormatter) {
260                        this.throwableFormatter = throwableFormatter;
261                        return self();
262
263                }
264
265                /**
266                 * Sets the throwable formatter. If not set
267                 * {@link io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogFormatter.ThrowableFormatter#of()} will be used.
268                 * @param throwableFormatter formatter to use for rendering throwables.
269                 * @return this builder.
270                 */
271                public T throwableFormatter(ThrowableFormatter throwableFormatter) {
272                        this.throwableFormatter = throwableFormatter;
273                        return self();
274
275                }
276
277                /**
278                 * Sets the key values formatter. If not set the default key values formatter will
279                 * be used which is a noop.
280                 * @param keyValuesFormatter formatter to use for rendering key values.
281                 * @return this builder.
282                 */
283                public T keyValuesFormatter(LogFormatter keyValuesFormatter) {
284                        this.keyValuesFormatter = keyValuesFormatter;
285                        return self();
286                }
287
288        }
289
290        @Override
291        public void format(StringBuilder output, LogEvent logEvent) {
292                eventFormatter.format(output, logEvent);
293        }
294
295}
